On his way to the battlefield Owlhawk spots a figure
below him.  He lands and transforms, then he reconizes
it and goes to attention.

Owlhawk:  TALOS SIR *salutes*!

Talos:  Cut the military crap Sunhawk.....assuming you
are Sunhawk.....well you act like him anyway......the
point is I'm tired of leading, report that you found
me dying and I asked you to bury me and keep the place
a secret.  My last words were Hot Rod should lead.

Owlhawk:  Got cha'.

He flies back to the base.

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> OOC: That's a good idea, but Talos was posted after
> that battle. I say the pressure of leadership was
> too great fro him so he went AWOL. He is just out
> there, somewhere. This leaves the possibility for a
> return. Since he can't be found Hot Rod will go to
> the bridge and make the announcement.
> That is, if everyone is ok with Hot Rod as
> Commander. Kup of course would keep Hot Rod in line,
> just as he did in the movie and 3rd season.
> 
> Oh and you are quite right about Kup's speech, Dewy.
> 
> IC: ::Kup::
> 
> "Well I cant pretend to know much about the Vok,
> lad. I am glad to know that someone is backing us
> though."
> 
> Kup turns towards the door.
> 
> "Do you know where Hot Rod is? I have some rather
> disturbing news for him."
>
